code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAppState}from'../../state/AppStateContext';import{getPrimarySavingsGoal,getTotalDebt}from'../../state/selectors';import{formatCurrency}from'../../utils/format';import'./Home.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Home(){const{accounts,userProfile}=useAppState();const primaryGoal=getPrimarySavingsGoal(accounts);const totalDebt=getTotalDebt(accounts);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"greeting",children:userProfile!==null&&userProfile!==void 0&&userProfile.topPriority?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Hi there \u2014 let's focus on: ",userProfile.topPriority]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hi there \u2014 ready to explore your money?"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"snapshot-summary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"snapshot-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"snapshot-label",children:"Primary goal progress:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"snapshot-value",children:primaryGoal?"".concat(primaryGoal.percent,"%"):'No goals yet'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"snapshot-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"snapshot-label",children:"Total debt:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"snapshot-value",children:totalDebt>0?formatCurrency(totalDebt):'No debt accounts'})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quick-nudge",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"What would you like to do?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cta-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/strategies",className:"cta-button primary",children:"Try a Recommended Strategy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/strategies/build",className:"cta-button secondary",children:"Build Your Own Strategy"})]})]})]});}
